comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Close firefox


Actual results:

Process doesn't terminate correctly and uses a full core of processing time until manually killed. It allows me to open another session while the other process is running, but closing THAT session results in a second process - using a second full core.


Expected results:

Complete process termination upon exit

comments.raw_text: Tjis is not a support website. It's probably caused by an extension. See <http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Firefox%20hangs?s=doesn%27t+quit&r=3&as=s#w_firefox-hangs-when-you-quit-it> for more information.
